name: Dudunsparce
description: The Land Snake Pokémon. This Pokémon uses its hard tail to make its nest by boring holes into bedrock deep underground. The nest can reach lengths of over six miles.

abilities.name: Serene Grace
abilities.description: The Move DC to pass a saving throw against one of this Pokémon's moves is increased by 1.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.description: This Pokémon cannot be the target of an attack of opportunity.

abilities.name: Rattled
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit by a damaging Dark, Bug, or Ghost move, it makes its next attack at advantage.
